organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.no_organizations_description: Organizations provide unified billing and administration. Get started by creating your first organization.
organizations.contact_email_help: Primary contact for billing and administrative notifications
organizations.billing_managed_by_default: Billing and subscription management is handled through your primary workspace. Visit your main workspace settings to manage payment methods and invoices.
organizations.switcher_locked: Organization switching not available on this page
organizations.organization_settings_description: Update your organization name and description
organizations.billing_coming_soon_description: Unified billing and subscription management will be available in a future release.
organizations.about_description: Organizations provide unified billing and administration for centralized management.
organizations.single_user_info_description: Update your company name and organization details here. This information helps personalize your account and can be used for branding features in the future.
organizations.getting_started_description: Create your first organization to manage your company information and prepare for future branding features.
organizations.page_description: Manage your organizations and team members
organizations.delete_organization_warning: This will permanently delete the organization. This action cannot be undone.
organizations.delete_organization_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage organization members and their roles
members.name: Name
members.no_members: No members yet. Invite team members to get started.
members.no_members_description: This organization has no members yet.
members.remove_member_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this organization?
members.cannot_change_own_role: You cannot change your own role
members.cannot_remove_self: You cannot remove yourself from the organization
members.cannot_remove_owner: You cannot remove the organization owner
members.insufficient_permissions: You do not have permission to manage members

role_descriptions.owner: Full access to all organization settings and members
role_descriptions.admin: Can manage members and most organization settings

invitations.title: Organization Invitations
invitations.must_sign_in: Please sign in to accept this invitation
invitations.upgrade_to_invite: Upgrade your plan to invite team members
invitations.upgrade_prompt: Team member invitations require a plan with team management. Upgrade to add collaborators to your organization.
